person.persName: Isaac Everett Sr. (Louisville, Kentucky, dry goods merchant and farmer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, dry goods merchant and farmer. Woodford County, Kentucky, native. Married to Adele Barney Everett. Farmer in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned twenty-one enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Proprietor of the Galt House hotel in Louisville in partnership with Aris Throckmorton. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned twenty enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860. Member of the board of directors of the Bank of Kentucky. Trustee of the University of Louisville.
